title: Fix equipment list undefined error in replace call

requirements.text: Fix the 'Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'replace')' error occurring in the equipment list view by adding null/undefined checks before any replace() method calls on equipment data fields

quotes: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'replace')     Error in equipment list

acceptanceCriteria: Equipment list page loads without crashing
All string operations on equipment fields are protected with null/undefined checks
Equipment with missing or null fields display gracefully without errors

requirements.text: Add defensive null/undefined handling in EquipmentListPage.tsx for all equipment fields that may be used in string operations, particularly focusing on fields passed to search, filter, or display logic
acceptanceCriteria: Equipment fields are validated before string methods are called
Empty or null values are handled with fallback display values
No runtime errors occur when equipment records have incomplete data

constraints: Do not modify the backend equipment data structure
Preserve existing equipment list functionality and UI layout
Maintain compatibility with existing equipment records in the database
nonGoals: Modifying the import or creation flow
